text: Ee, nza kha buni nzuai ne khaŋ muuŋgire? Nza wari wom wo zɨri ndi vun kuamkuagire? Ee, nza gumgi mbari farar muuŋgip harigi gumgi ga suaŋrim, mbe gavi kherɨv, nde ndim maaŋv, khaŋ nde suaŋrie, nza gumgir vhuuiŋ ma? Ee, nza ndera suaŋrim, nde nzan kurkurar saŋv maaŋ muuŋgi gavi kherɨrie? Zakɨra fhuvara!
